CoMIT 1.0.1

    Reference

    All functions

    addVariant2DB()

    Insert new Variant into a CoMIT database and add to cache$primerVars

    add_extra_metadata()

    Insert location and sequencing information

    buildDBFromSchema()

    Build a database from a given SQL schema file

    build_COVID_DB()

    Build COVID-19 Analysis Database

    classifyFromAlignment()

    Classify Variant from a masked alignment

    classifyVariant()

    Classify an identified variant sequence and insert into Variant Info and Variant Type tables

    comit_classify()

    COMIT Variant Classifier

    formatDF()

    Format Database Breakdown Dataframe

    formatDF_2()

    Format Database Breakdown Dataframe V2

    format_as_gt_tbl()

    Format Assay Summary GT Table

    format_as_gt_tbl_2()

    Format Assay Summary GT Table V2

    format_co_gt_tbl()

    Format Co-occurring Mutations GT Table

    format_co_gt_tbl_2()

    Format Co-occurring Mutations GT Table V2

    getAssaySummaryCounts()

    Get Assay Summary Counts

    getAssaySummaryCounts_2()

    Get Assay Summary Counts V2

    getCoOccCounts()

    Get Co-Occurring Counts

    getCoOccCounts5to7()

    Get Co-occurring Counts for 5 to 7 Assays

    getCoOccCounts5to7_2()

    Get Co-occurring Counts for 5 to 7 Assays V2

    getCoOccCounts_2()

    Get Co-Occurring Counts V2

    getMaskedAlignmentList()

    Get Masked Alignment List from supplied primers

    getMetaData()

    Parse metadata from a Dataframe

    getThreeAssayProportion()

    Get Three-Assay Proportion

    group_block_anno()

    Add Group Block Annotation

    makeAssaySummaryTables()

    Make Assay Summary Tables

    makeAssaySummaryTablesCondensed()

    Make Assay Summary Tables (Condensed Version)

    makeCoOccHeatmaps()

    Make Heatmaps for Co-occurring mutations

    makeCoOccTables()

    Make Tables for Co-occurring mutations

    makeCoOccTablesCondensed()

    Make Tables for Co-occurring mutations (Condensed Version)

    makeCombinedDataframe()

    Make Combined Dataframe

    makeCombinedDataframe_2()

    Make Combined Dataframe V2

    makeDFcoOcc()

    Make Co-occurring Mutations Dataframe

    makeDFcoOccHeatmap()

    Make Dataframe for Co-occurring Mutations Heatmap

    makeDFcoOcc_2()

    Make Co-occurring Mutations Dataframe V2

    makeDFdatabaseBreakdown()

    Make Database Breakdown Dataframe

    makeDFdatabaseBreakdown_2()

    Make Database Breakdown Dataframe V2

    makePrimerVarFreqLinDFs()

    Make primer variant frequency and lineage dataframes

    makePrimerVarMutationDF()

    Make Primer Variant Mutation Dataframe

    makePrimerVarTable()

    Make primer variant visualization

    makedbBreakdownTable()

    Make Database Breakdown Table

    makedbBreakdownTableCondensed()

    Make Database Breakdown Table (Condensed Version)

    mismatchGenerator()

    Generate Mismatches for a primer sequence

    parseFastaLine()

    Parse GISAID FASTA line for metadata and check for sequences with no accession number, the wrong host, and/or invalid collection dates

    pull_subset_db()

    Pull subset DB

    reorderVect()

    Reorder vect - change the position of what in vect to where

    setSubsetStrings()

    Set strings in "subset" environment for pull_subset_DB function

    translateMutationForward()

    Translate a Seq Change String to a Primer Template Mismatch for Forward primers

    translateMutationReverse()

    Translate a Seq Change String to a Primer Template Mismatch for Reverse primers

    update_db()

    Update DB (Add sequence info to a database)
